sn45.25:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchaditthiko hoti, micchasankappo, micchavaco, micchakammanto, micchaajivo, micchavayamo, micchasati, micchasamadhi—
sn45.25:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sammaditthiko hoti, sammasankappo, sammavaco, sammakammanto, sammaajivo, sammavayamo, sammasati, sammasamadhi—
